title: Friendly Challenges in Clash of Clans: Battling Your Clanmates

steps.title: Open Clan chat by clicking or dragging the side arrow on the left.
steps.content: Open Clan chat by clicking or dragging the side arrow on the left.

steps.title: Click the Challenge button at the top of Clan chat.
steps.content: Click the Challenge button at the top of Clan chat.

steps.title: Choose a base by clicking Replace Layout.
steps.content: Choose a base by clicking Replace Layout . This displays all available layouts. Also, request Clan Castle troops if you don't have any. Add custom text if you don't like the default text, which is "Can you beat my village?"

steps.title: Press Start! to issue the challenge.
steps.content: Press Start! to issue the challenge. You can cancel the Challenge before anyone has started attacking.

steps.title: Press Watch Live icon to watch your village attacked live.
steps.content: Press Watch Live icon to watch your village attacked live.

steps.title: Press Return Home to return to your base.
steps.content: Press Return Home to return to your base.

steps.title: Open Clan Chat by clicking or dragging the side arrow on the left.
steps.content: Open Clan Chat by clicking or dragging the side arrow on the left.

steps.title: Press Scout to view the village.
steps.content: Press Scout to view the village.

steps.title: Press Attack! to attack the village.
steps.content: Press Attack! to attack the village.

steps.title: Press Attack again to confirm your attack in the Attack Now?
steps.content: Press Attack again to confirm your attack in the Attack Now? box.

steps.title: Press Return Home to return to your base.
steps.content: Press Return Home to return to your base.

steps.title: Watch the Replay of the challenge later if you like.
steps.content: Watch the Replay of the challenge later if you like.
